text: Harry Kewell (born 22 September 1978 in Sydney) is a former Australian football player. He has played for the Australia men's national soccer team. He used to play for Leeds United in the Championship and then Galatasaray in the Süper Lig. His junior club was Marconi Stallions. He played as a midfielder, a striker or a wing. == Career == Harry Kewell started playing for Liverpool in 2003 before that he played for Leeds United. He was offered more money at other clubs such as Arsenal, Chelsea, Milan, Manchester United, Barcelona, Juventus and Real Madrid but eventually he chose to play at Liverpool.
